messages.client_advance_notice_en:
Dear {{client_name}},

This is a courtesy reminder that your fee agreement with {{firm_name}} for the matter of {{matter_description}} will expire on {{agreement_expiry}}.

We value our professional relationship and would like to continue representing you. A member of our team will reach out to discuss renewal terms.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
{{firm_name}}
